queries.description: The operand of the typeid may or may not be evaluated if it is a function call and reliance on side effects will result in unexpected behavior.
queries.name: Evaluation of the operand to the typeid operator shall not contain side effects

A5-3-1.title: Evaluation of the operand to the typeid operator shall not contain side effects.

queries.description: The evaluation of the right hand operand of the logical && and || operators depends on the left hand operand so reliance on side effects will result in unexpected behavior.
queries.name: The right hand operand of a logical &&, || operators shall not contain side effects

M5-14-1.title: The right hand operand of a logical &&, || operators shall not contain side effects.

queries.description: The sizeof operator does not evaluate expressions so reliance on side effects will result in unexpected behavior.
queries.name: Evaluation of the operand to the sizeof operator shall not contain side effects

M5-3-4.title: Evaluation of the operand to the sizeof operator shall not contain side effects.

queries.description: Depending on the order of evaluation for side effects for evaluation of scalar objects that are unsequenced results in undefined behavior.
queries.name: Do not depend on the order of scalar object evaluation for side effects

queries.description: Depending on the order of evaluation for side effects in function calls that are function arguments can result in unexpected program behavior.
queries.name: Do not depend on the order of evaluation of function calls as function arguments for side effects

EXP50-CPP.title: Do not depend on the order of evaluation for side effects

queries.description: The sizeof operator does not evaluate expressions so reliance on side effects will result in unexpected behavior.
queries.name: Do not rely on side effects in the operator sizeof

queries.description: The typeid operator does not always evaluate expressions so reliance on side effects will result in unexpected behavior.
queries.name: Do not rely on side effects in the operator typeid

queries.description: The noexcept operator does not evaluate expressions so reliance on side effects will result in unexpected behavior.
queries.name: Do not rely on side effects in the operator noexcept

queries.description: The decltype operator does not evaluate expressions so reliance on side effects will result in unexpected behavior.
queries.name: Do not rely on side effects in the operator decltype

queries.description: The declval operator does not evaluate expressions so reliance on side effects will result in unexpected behavior.
queries.name: Do not rely on side effects in the operator declval

EXP52-CPP.title: Do not rely on side effects in unevaluated operands
